problem: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB,垂足为E,如果AB=10,CD=8,那么线段AE的长为()
answer: 【解答】解:连接OC,如图,∵AB是⊙O的直径,AB=10,∴OC=OA=5,∵CD⊥AB,∴CE=DE=\frac{1}{2}CD=\frac{1}{2}×8=4,在Rt△OCE中,OC=5,CE=4,∴OE=√{OC²-CE²}=3,∴AE=OA-OE=5-3=2．
comment: 本题考查了垂径定理:平分弦的直径平分这条弦,并且平分弦所对的两条弧．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, the chord CD ⊥ AB, the vertical foot is E, if AB = N_0, CD = N_1, then the length of the line segment AE is ()
